summary: An ordinance relating to motor vehicle traffic, travel and transportation and incidents thereof upon the streets and other ways open to the public and the regulation thereof by the Traffic Code; and amending Section 50.03 of said Code (Ordinance 80998) as last amended by Ordinance 88462, to increase the speed limit on 15th Ave. West and 15th Ave. N.W. from West Raye Street to Leary Way to 40 miles per hour.
